meta_data.title: Bitesize Php | BiteSize Php - a bespoke micro-framework
meta_data.description: A custom micro Php framework written by Andi Lee Davis

content.search_string: A custom micro Php framework written by Andi Lee Davis
content.html:
BiteSize Php is a custom micro Php framework written by Andi Lee Davis. It's a simple Php MVC framework devised to create a small website from a JSON file.

It is currently a little work in progress

meta_data.title: What is BiteSize Php? | BiteSize PHP
meta_data.description: BiteSize PHP is custom/bespoke micro PHP Framework to get simple website pages up and running

content.html: BiteSize Php is a custom micro Php framework written by Andi Lee Davis. It's a simple Php MVC framework devised to create a small website from a JSON file.
